string.value: |It was not an easy fight. Why do they even need this head? What are they going to do with it?
|First I have to separate it from the body. It takes some skill.
|Done. I can go back, I have the head now.
|What's that sparkling? It looks like one of those things the Oracle was talking about!
|Got it!
|Now I have everything I need. It's time to go back to the Oracle.
|The first robo-repairer is in place. What a rush to get to work!
|Now the second robo-repairer has begun his work. All that's left is to deliver the last one.
|The third robo-repairer is ready! Hopefully, this will help Oracle get his memory back.
|What I haven't seen in my travels. And these footprints in the fields. Who leaves them?
|Scientists in Midgard can help me solve this mystery.
|It's too narrow. My truck can't pass through here, and it's too dangerous to walk by feet.
|I need to look for a smaller vehicle. I think I've seen what I need around here.
|Thanks to whoever left this car here. I can use it to get into the factory.
|I don't think anyone would be offended if I borrowed it for a while. Fuel first, the ignition, the engine!
|Woah, this car is fast, damn it.
|I have nothing else to do there.
|There's the monster. I don't think he'll give me his head by his own will, so I'll have to fight.
|It's the dangerous enemy, but I can handle him!
|I've never seen such huge ruins... I wonder what was here before the catastrophe?
|The main entrance is blocked, I'll try to drive along the railroad.
You cannot leave this place on this vehicle. It is too dangerous. You'd better use your own truck.
Do you wish to travel to another region?
